page.title: 10Grosmont Village
page.content:
**{Grosmont Village}**
{Grosmont}is a small village which has only two shops - the CO-OP and a post office. However, it attracts a large number of tourists each year who come to see the{'NYMR' steam trains,}which run between{Grosmont}&{Pickering.
Other attractions in the village include the{'Loco Sheds'}where visitors can go and watch the steam trains being renovated, a local garden centre and a{BMX circuit.
The village started life in the year {1200}when land was given to build a priory. Later on the village expanded with the discovery of{iron ore.}The mine workings closed long ago.
By Simon Pick
